snippet: Two critics for The New York Times sample the world of contemporary work at the Frieze Art Fair.
abstract: Frieze New York art fair has opened on Randalls Island with more than 190 contemporary art dealers from around the world inhabiting quarter-mile long tent; highlights listed.

byline.original: By KEN JOHNSON and MARTHA SCHWENDENER

lead_paragraph: Two critics for The New York Times sample the world of contemporary work at the Frieze Art Fair.

headline.seo: Two Critics Sample the Frieze Art Fair
